text: aur vahee hai, jisane aakaashon tatha dharatee kee rachana saty ke saath kee[1] hai aur jis din vah kahega ki "ho ja" to vah (pralay) ho jaayega. usaka kathan saty hai aur jis din narasingha mein phoonk diya jaayega, us din usee ka raajy hoga. vah paroksh tatha[2] pratyaksh ka gyaanee hai aur vahee gunee sarvasoochit hai
